---
id: delete-stock
title: "Delete Stock for Product"
description: "Deletes the inventory for the specified product. The product inventory is null and is no longer managed by Commerce. If you want to keep managing inventory but have none of the product in stock, set the inventory to `0` instead of deleting the inventory."
sidebar_label: "Delete Stock for Product"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"
info_path: docs/api/pxm/inventory/inventories-introduction
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Stock for Product"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/inventories/{product_uuid}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes the inventory for the specified product. The product inventory is null and is no longer managed by Commerce. If you want to keep managing inventory but have none of the product in stock, set the inventory to `0` instead of deleting the inventory.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

      Path Parameters
    </h3>

    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"product_uuid","in":"path","description":"The unique identifier of the product.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><div>

                            >

                              <div
